data.message:
When am gone 
that's was the Last song making me calm when am in stress...istill love it man big up and keep recording we wanna hear mord from you Shady,always love your songs even remix you still dope than cold pin cicles.they will talk inow bt don't ever try to quit your dream please.if you thinkin about that remember who will provide your daughters,who will encourage Fans after that you will be sorry.......

#LOVE YOU SHADY
